          <title>
            <string language="en">Formation of ammonium chloride</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung der Ammoniumchlorverbindung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation de chlorure d'ammonium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação do cloreto de ammonium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione del cloruro di ammonio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός του χλωριδίου αμμωνίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación del cloruro de amonio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the set-up for the reaction of HCl(g) and ammonia(g) forming ammonium chloride.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Installation für die 
Reaktion von HCl(g) und von ammonia(g), die Ammoniumchlorverbindung 
bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'installation pour la 
réaction de HCl(g) et d'ammonia(g) formant le chlorure d'ammonium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a instalação para a 
reação de HCl(g) e de ammonia(g) que dão forma ao cloreto de 
ammonium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la messa a punto per 
la reazione di HCl(g) e di ammonia(g) che formano il cloruro di 
ammonio.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την οργάνωση για την

χλωρίδιο αμμωνίου.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la disposición para la 
reacción de HCl(g) y del ammonia(g) que forman el cloruro de amonio.</string>
